entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
We talked about using the single responsibility principle to create multiple .js files to perfrom a single function and importing those files into a main.js
Added JS to daily journal in order to render journal entries on the journal entries page
Today I learned how to set up a local API using JSON server to manage data for the Glassdale PD and Daily Journals apps :)
